overview: The boss has a funny episode on his colleagues. The other day, he have a blind date, and the woman had a beard. Minhee is a smiling awkwardly among her colleagues. That evening, Minhee is contacted by her ex-boyfriend, Kang sik. Min hee, who cares about the word of the boss, is shaving… Min hee is wounded while she is shaving. Min-hee meets Kang-sik at a bar, while being injured. Kang sik suffers to Min-hee, and Min-hee rejects it by turns. Then kang-sik touches the scars of Min-hee Min-hee cries out to Kang-sik for a refusal… The next day, Min-hee met the boss in the break room. How will Min-hee react to his rude boss?
title: Good Girl
